#summary Description of the /game/events/ack/ page.
#labels Phase-Design

=== Introduction ===
The game events + ack page is used to get all game events from a certain id onwards. All events before 'ack' are removed from the list.

=== Method ===
HTTP POST 

=== Request ===
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ack>57</ack>
}}}

=== Response ===
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<events lastEventNumber="7">
  <event>
    <msg>A new deal with guy (100 chips), kenzo (100 chips) as initial players of this table. kenzo is dealer.</msg>
  </event>
  <event>
    <msg>kenzo deals.</msg>
  </event>
  <event>
    <msg>kenzo has received new pocket cards: 6 of spades, 5 of hearts.</msg>
    <cards type="private">
      <card suit="spades">6</card>
      <card suit="hearts">5</card>
    </cards>
  </event>
  <event>
    <msg>pre-flop round: guy can begin to act.</msg>
  </event>
  <event>
    <msg>guy bets the small blind of 5 chips.</msg>
  </event>
  <event>
    <msg>kenzo bets the big blind of 10 chips.</msg>
  </event>
  <event>
    <msg>It's guy's turn.</msg>
  </event>
</events>
}}}
